DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate patient recurrent refractory stage II III multiple myeloma treat arsenic trioxide dexamethasone . - Determine rate overall relapse-free survival patient treat regimen . - Determine safety profile treatment regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive arsenic trioxide IV daily 5 day first week 2 day week thereafter . Patients also receive IV oral dexamethasone day 1-4 every 4 week . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Disease assessment conduct every 4 week . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive 2 additional course therapy initial determination CR . Final assessment conduct 4 week last study treatment annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 55 patient accrue study .
